name: MARSI
short_description: Among the most widely used oscillators ever, an ingenious interpretation of the RSI with averages placed adhock

params.title: MARSI x.x.x.
params.content: The name, version, and link to find references for this tool

params.title: MA Period
params.content: The number of bars to be used for the calculation of the average

params.title: MA Source
params.content: The source of the data to be processed

params.title: RSI Period
params.content: The number of bars to be used for the calculation of the RSI

params.title: Fast period
params.content: The number of bars to be used for the calculation of the fast RSI
